alert.note: Alert for Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 2:50PM MST until December 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Blizzard Warning, ground blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Blizzard Warning, from Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions through this evening. Then Strong winds are expected to develop tonight into Wednesday and cause extensive blowing and drifting of snow. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
